scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && rm -rf example/css/flipdown && mkdir -p example/css/flipdown && rm -rf example/js/flipdown && mkdir -p example/js/flipdown
scripts.dist: cp src/flipdown.js dist/flipdown-v0.1.2.js && cp src/flipdown.css dist/flipdown-v0.1.2.css
scripts.example: cp src/flipdown.js example/js/flipdown/flipdown.js && cp src/flipdown.css example/css/flipdown/flipdown.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run dist && npm run example
